# duration

**Instance Property**

The duration required to complete an action.

## Declaration

```swift
var duration: TimeInterval { get set }
```

## Discussion

This is the expected duration of an action’s animation. The actual time an action takes to complete is modified by the action’s [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNAction/timingMode] property.

## Adjusting an Action’s Animation Properties

- **speed**: A speed factor that modifies how fast an action runs.
- **timingMode**: The timing mode used to execute an action.
- **timingFunction**: A block SceneKit calls to determine the action’s animation timing.
